name: NSStackViewDelegate
desc: A set of methods you use to respond to a stack view detaching and reattaching views.

items.name: func stackView(NSStackView, didReattach: [NSView])
items.desc: Called when the stack view has automatically reattached one or more previously-detached views.

items.name: func stackView(NSStackView, willDetach: [NSView])
items.desc: Called when the stack view is about to automatically detach one or more of its views.
